{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=RE7000 |asin=B01DT48WZS |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=U-MEDIA |availability=new |price=149.99 |est_release_date=05/25/2016 |fcc_date=04/14/2016 |fcc_id=Q87-RE7000 |ic_id=3839A-RE7000 |type=range extender |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=NEMA 1-15P |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7621AT |cpu1_cspeed=880 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L12835FM2I-10G |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC64M16GP-DI |serial=yes,, 4-pin header |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7603EN |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7615N |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |flags=MU-MIMO |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }} {{TagLine|Max-Stream AC1900+ MU-MIMO Wi-Fi Range Extender}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-RE7000/}}{{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=RE7000|pid=01t34000003w4tcAAA}} *FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/Q87-RE7000 Q87-RE7000] (2016-04-14) AC1733/N300 *FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/Q87-RE6800 Q87-RE6800] (2016-12-15) AC1733/N300 "0500-2540800400" and "1602" (01/2016) is silkscreened on the [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=2958647 board]. {{see also|Linksys|U-MEDIA}} ===See also=== [http://www.linksys.com/us/range-extenders/c/wireless-wi-fi-range-extenders/ Wireless Range Extenders]
